code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var DEFAULT_UBUS_SESSION='0000000000000000000000000000000';var initialState={session:DEFAULT_UBUS_SESSION,username:'',timeout:300,expires:300,keepAliveBeatCounter:0,systemInfo:{},acls:{}};var slice=createSlice({name:'session',initialState:initialState,reducers:{loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;var ubus_rpc_session=payload.ubus_rpc_session,timeout=payload.timeout,expires=payload.expires,acls=payload.acls,data=payload.data;state.session=ubus_rpc_session;state.timeout=timeout;state.expires=expires;state.acls=acls;state.username=data.username;},logout:function logout(){return initialState;},updateSystemInfo:function updateSystemInfo(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;state.systemInfo=payload;},keepAliveBeat:function keepAliveBeat(state){state.keepAliveBeatCounter=state.keepAliveBeatCounter+1;}}});export var sessionActions=slice.actions;export var sessionSelector=function sessionSelector(state){return state.session;};export default slice.reducer;
